member.name: T:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.ODataException
member.summary: An exception which is thrown if there is an error processing an OData query.

member.name: M:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.ODataException.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.ODataException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.ODataException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.name: M:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.ODataException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The class name is null or is zero (0).

member.name: T:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.Query.AllowedArithmeticOperators
member.summary: An enumeration which represents the arithmetic operators allowed in the $filter query option of an OData query.

member.name: F:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.Query.AllowedArithmeticOperators.None
member.summary: Specifies that no arithmetic operators are allowed in the $filter query option.

member.name: F:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.Query.AllowedArithmeticOperators.Add
member.summary: Specifies that the 'add' logical operator is allowed in the $filter query option.

member.summary: Specifies that the 'sub' logical operator is allowed in the $filter query option.

member.summary: Specifies that the 'mul' logical operator is allowed in the $filter query option.

member.summary: Specifies that the 'div' logical operator is allowed in the $filter query option.

member.name: F:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.Query.AllowedArithmeticOperators.Modulo
member.summary: Specifies that the 'mod' logical operator is allowed in the $filter query option.

member.name: F:Net.Http.WebApi.OData.Query.AllowedArithmeticOperators.All
member.summary: Specifies that all logical arithmetic are allowed in the $filter query option.
